title: Game Boy Advance Backlit Screen Mod
description: I was getting nostalgic for GBA games, but hated the reflective screen on my original GBA. What to do? Mod it, of course!  Be sure to check out the follow up videos to watch my setbacks and ultimate success with this mod:  Follow up:  Tweak and final results:   -----------------------------------------------------------------------------  Please consider supporting my work on Patreon:   Follow me on Twitter and Instagram! @thisdoesnotcomp  TDNC t-shirts and apparel can be found at   This Does Not Compute PO Box 131141 St. Paul, MN 55113  -----------------------------------------------------------------------------  Music by Leandro Pulmones ( and Jason Shaw (
